OneFi | London, UK | Full-time | VP Engineering | https://onefi.co

We're a small team of high performers who have built the leading African Mobile First Consumer Lending Business. Ranked #1 for Finance apps (and #41 overall) in Google Play in Nigeria. Fast growing business (5%/month). Well funded. Team spread between Lagos, Cape Town and San Francisco. As we expand our platform to new markets (Ivory Coast, Ghana, Senegal, Egypt), we are establishing our senior leadership in London.

VP of Engineering [https://careers.onefi.co/3/] : Responsible for the entire engineering organization. This includes recruiting, retention, organizational structure, technical architecture and roadmaps, engineering process and practices, and outcomes.

In the last couple of months, we've hired some awesome folks who will work alongside you in London: a Senior Product Manager, a Head of Data Science, and a Head of Risk. It will be up to you and them to build the culture and team you want.
